titleNullable: Sales Data - Adjusted Target and Missing Pipeline
descriptionNullable:
_____
# Sales Data - Adjusted Target and Missing Pipeline
### WOW2020 Week 16 Dataset
By Lorna Brown [[source]](https://data.world/missdataviz)
_____

### About this dataset
> This Sales Pipeline dataset provides detailed insights into the process and performance of sales opportunities, offering insights into how successful each opportunity has been. Each row provides the date the opportunity was created, when it was closed (if applicable), its stage in the sales process, its name, and how much in sales were generated. With this dataset any business can analyze their sales cycles and determine which processes are working best for them as well as pinpoint which areas need more attention or improvement to ensure they are keeping up with trends on their industry. Knowing this information not only gives you an edge over competition but also allows you to make informed decisions about your own business practices in order to maximize profit. It's time to break those records!

### More Datasets
> For more datasets, click [here](https://www.kaggle.com/thedevastator/datasets).

### Featured Notebooks
> - 🚨 **Your notebook can be here!** 🚨! 

### How to use the dataset
> This dataset offers insights into the sales pipeline of a business. It contains information on the date a particular opportunity was created, the date it closed and the stage of the sales process it is currently in. The column 'Opportunity Name' shows what type of products or services are being sold, while 'Sales' records how much money has been generated from that specific sale. This data can be used to help business owners investigate which products or services have higher sales potential and which areas in their sales pipeline need improvement. 
> The first step for using this dataset should be familiarizing oneself with its columns and what each represents; such as Created Date, Closed Date, Stage and Opportunity Name etc. After understanding this, dive deeper by analyzing each stage of your company’s sales pipeline to determine areas where there has been success and opportunities to increase those numbers even more. By utilizing powerful insights from reviewing this data set, you will have all that you need to see how your business is running in real-time allowing you to strategize new ways to further optimize your performance!  
> Additionally plotting trends over time periods allow one look at repeating patterns within their dataset as well as explore correlations between attributes like product type with multiples stages along with associated dollar amounts spent throughout these stages provide additional valuable information used for decision making when approaching certain types of commercial activities  
>  Finally visualizing customer journey flow provide an additional layer off analysis by connecting dots between various customer interaction concerning different parts off purchase funnel (e g impression count ,best performing Ad etc). 
>  Utilizing all these sophisticated analysis provides mission critical insights needed for decision making leading towards measured results/ improves ROI metrics  behind every significant marketing campaigns .   
>  Hence using Sales Pipeline dataset involving utilising variety off data acquisition ,preparation & advanced interrogation strategies -- opens up valuable gateways towards understanding yours organizational working ecosystem helping make informed decisions 

### Research Ideas
> - Measuring the effectiveness of various types of marketing campaigns by analyzing how different stages of the sales pipeline are impacted.  
> - Comparing average performance metrics among certain target customers segments, such as industry or geography, to inform differences in sales strategies.   
> - Analyzing customer behavior over time to help identify certain trends in selling cycle duration and success rates for different opportunities

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> [Data Source](https://data.world/missdataviz)
 
 
### License
 > 
> See the dataset description for more information.

### Columns

**File: Sales Pipeline.csv**
| Column name          | Description                                                         |
|:---------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Created Date**     | Date when the opportunity was created. (DateTime)                   |
| **Closed Date**      | Date when the opportunity was closed. (DateTime)                    |
| **Stage**            | The stage of the sales process the opportunity is in. (Categorical) |
| **Opportunity Name** | The name of the opportunity. (String)                               |
| **Sales**            | The amount of sales associated with the opportunity. (Numerical)    |

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit [Lorna Brown](https://data.world/missdataviz).
